message: I have tried to "rebuild" my harddrive etc not working, might try to reformat it tonight.
So my PS3 has been hiccuping during gameplay for the last two games i have tried to play (UC3 and Heavenly Sword) but Demon Soul's plays fine.  Anyone have any idea what might be causing this?
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MnNNyrl_JZw this is kinda what its doing
Is it video or audio or both?  Especially if its audio check the connections/receiver or whatever set up you have, easy and quick to do and potentially saves loads of time.
its video and audio on heavenly sword and for UC3 its audio only in game and video and audio in cut scenes
That is weird as hell, I'd hope its your HDD or a quirk with the current firmware.
what connection are you using, HDMI, etc?  Also, if you can, plug in the component cables and see if it works on those.
will have to take a look but good idea
try components then come back, if you still have them
